function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Touching switch, button, doorknobs, and surfaces in a shared building can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmitting contagious diseases within the building.","Mitigation":"Use sensor-based fixtures and devices to minimize the need for physical contact with surfaces and objects.","Technologies":"Sensor-based fixtures and devices for touchless operation.","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in the building.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Inadequate placement of wash basins and hand sanitizers can lead to poor hygiene and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of germs and viruses spreading, leading to the potential outbreak of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Optimize the placement of wash basins and hand sanitizers in strategic locations to promote effective hand hygiene.","Technologies":"Sensor-based fixtures for touchless operation, strategic spatial zoning for washbasin placement.","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in the building.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Large distance between entry and wash area in apartment floor plans can facilitate the spread of germs and viruses, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to inadequate spatial zoning.","Mitigation":"Implement better spatial zoning and orientation to minimize the distance between entry and wash areas, reducing the potential spread of germs and viruses.","Technologies":"Spatial planning and zoning, architectural design for optimal space utilization.","People":"Residents and visitors to the apartment building.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff."}]}
